attributes.action: Put the British culture, traditions and welfare of Britain first and remember who put you where you are today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people put Tony Blair where he is today and he has repaid us by ignoring our wishes. He has put the needs and cultures of foreigners who have settled in this country ahead of those of the British people. He has betrayed us by handing over so much of our powers to the EU, against our wishes. We have not even been allowed a referendum about our membership of the EU.

rejection.details: The title of your petiton needs to have a clear call-to-action
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
